name: Create a folder
description: Create a new folder in the system with the given name

name: Send Whatsapp Message
description: Send a Whatsapp message, given the name of the contact to send the message, and text to send as parameters

parameters.name: contact_name
parameters.description: The name of the contact that will receive the message

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The text that must be send in the message

name: Print Screen
description: Print a value in the screen, given this value as a parameter

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value that must be printed in the screen
